text:
Onsite Health Diagnostics | Software Developer | Coppell, TX | full-time | onsite | https://www.onsitehealthdiagnostics.org

Work with a small dev team at a stable health screenings company. We run a monolithic ruby & rails stack with minimal JS and very little tech debt. Help us maintain and scale up in the cloud. Email abreckenridge@onsitehd.com for more details.
